Slayer

×

Slayer is a single-player 2D browser Role-Playing Game (RPG). To win, you must defeat all 100 monsters on the map. As you defeat more monsters, your level and strength increase. Open the various chests around the map to discover healing items and more powerful weapons.

Instructions

How to win:

To win the game, you must defeat all 100 monsters on the map without letting your HP reach zero. If you die, you lose the game.

Controls:

Use the four arrow keys to move around the map. You can move vertical, horizontal, and diagonal.

Select items from your inventory shown on the right by clicking on them. Stats are shown to the right of each item in your inventory.

To open chests, simply walk over them. Similarly, walk into monsters to initiate fights!

During fights, quickly press 'enter' to attack! You can see your HP in the lower left of the screen and the enemy's in the top right. Don't let yours hit zero!

Hints:

Healing items and more powerful weapons can be found in the various chests around the map.

Keep defeating monsters to level up for more damage!

Use your inventory in order to heal yourself and to select your active weapon.

View your current stats at the top right of the map.
